task.title: How to Adjust the Blinds in Shanks Hall

context.p: Natural lighting can help create a more serene working or studying environment. This task will cover how to adjust the blinds in Shanks Hall so you can get your preferred lighting.

step.cmd: Locate the silver chain that adjusts the blinds.
Pull on the silver chain while moving it slightly to the left. Keep pulling on the chain until you have the desired amount of natural lighting.
Once you have your desired lighting, move the chain to the right and let go.
If you want to put the blinds back down, pull the chain, move it slightly to the left, and let go.
